items.title: U.S. strikes another alleged drug vessel, killing three
items.description: The U.S. military struck another alleged drug trafficking boat in the Caribbean Thursday, killing three people, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said.

items.title: Rep. Elise Stefanik announces campaign for New York governor
items.description: Republican Rep. Elise Stefanik has launched her bid for governor of New York, challenging Democratic incumbent Gov. Kathy Hochul.

items.title: Trump says U.S. reaches $100 billion trade deal with Uzbekistan

items.title: Heritage's antisemitism task force breaks off from foundation, will also probe right-wing threats
